casebody.data:
Walter I. CURRANT, Plaintiff, Appellant, v. EASTERN STEAMSHIP LINES, Inc., Defendant, Appellee. No. 4357. United States Court of Appeals First Circuit. Oct 29, 1948. Stanley H. Rudman, of Boston, Mass. (Joseph Schneider and Schneider, Reilly & Bean, all of Boston, Mass., with him on brief), for appellant. William B. Sleigh, Jr., of Boston, Mass. (Arthur J. Santry and Putnam, Bell, Dutch & Santry, all of Boston, Mass., on brief), for appellee.

Before MAGRUDER, Chief Judge, and GOODRICH and WOODBURY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The order of the District Court is affirmed upon the opinion of Judge Healey reported in 77 F.Supp. 9.
